data.title: Street labels aren't on top for version 11 of mapbox streets · Issue #11 · mapbox/mapbox-gl-traffic
data.meta_description: In mapbox-streets-v11 the labels are part of the road source-layer. Hence, when the traffic layer is being added, the road-label layer is defined before the traffic layers in de map's style. I added some images as proof and also what is ...
